籤詩版本二:
Ngokomzekelo, ibakala lesithathu, lesine, nelesihlanu kwinyanga yokuqala yenyanga azikho, isiqingatha asikho, isiqingatha sabakho, kwaye asiphelelanga.
Ukulinda i-snack yasezinzulwini zobusuku ngomhla weshumi elinesihlanu wonyaka, yonke into ikhanya kwaye igcwele
詩意:
Kule hexagram, inyanga ayikho kodwa ayigcwalanga.
Yiba nomonde kwinto yonke.
解曰: Hlala ulondoloza kwaye ulinde. Njengenyanga yokuqala yenyanga. Ilinde ixesha lokujikeleza. Akukho nto imbi.
籤詩故事一:
◇Li Yuan wenyuka etroneni
Kwiminyaka yokugqibela ye-Sui Dynasty, u-Emperor Yang we-Sui Dynasty wayekhohlakele kwaye ephazamisekile, ezonwabisa kuyo yonke indawo, ebangela inzondo phakathi kwabantu kwaye esahlula ubukhosi phakathi kwamagorha.
Ngo-618 AD, uYu Wenhuaji, uSima Dekan, uPei Qantong kunye nabanye baqalisa uvukelo lokubulala uMlawuli uYang weSui Dynasty kwaye babhengeza uYang Hao njengomlawuli.
Kungekudala u-Yu Wenhuaji wabulala uQin Wanghao waza wazibiza ngokuba nguMlawuli uXu, eseka ilizwe elithi Xu.
Kunyaka olandelayo, watshatyalaliswa ngokudibeneyo yinjengele yeTang uLi Shentong kunye nokumkani waseXia uDou Jiande.
Emva kokuba ummandla waseCentral Plains uvile ngokufa koMlawuli uYang, umlindi waseLuoyang uWang Shichong waxhasa uKumkani uDong waseYue njengomlawuli, oko kukuthi, uMlawuli uAyi waseSui Dynasty.
Ngeli xesha, uLi Yuan wasusa uYang You, wazibhengeza njengomlawuli eTaiyuan, kwaye walitshintsha igama lelizwe laba yiTang. Le yiTang Gaozu.
聖意: Uzinqwenelela ikhaya kunye nendlu, ithamsanqa ehlotyeni nasekwindla, lumkele ukuthengiselana, linda ixesha, umtshato usemva, uLiujia uzala intombi, abahambi ngeenyawo bavaliwe, iintshulube zizinzile, imfuyo izinzile, kunzima. ukufumana abantu, amatyala kawonke-wonke kunye nokufuduka kuyalondoloza, impahla elahlekileyo inzima, ukugula kunzima ukumisa, ukuthumela kwingcwaba lentaba, kunye nokutshintsha
